title: Horror Pinball
description: Get ready for a spine-chilling pinball experience!

title: BlackJack Mini
description: Get ready for some quick, catchy fun with 'BlackJack Mini'! Designed for both mobile and PC, this small web game offers fast-paced gameplay perfect for those moments when you need a quick break.
partner: Made in cooperation with BlackMoon Design

title: Cooking Hippos
description: Step into the adorable world of 'Cooking Hippos' where you become a cute Hippo Chef tasked with preparing delicious fries and hotdogs on randomly generated levels!
partner: Made in cooperation with BlackMoon Design

title: Checkers
description: Experience the thrill of strategic gameplay and immersive visuals on both HTML5 and Mobile platforms, ensuring you can enjoy the excitement anytime, anywhere!
partner: Made in cooperation with BlackMoon Design

title: Domino Solitaire
description: Our new casual arcade game that will keep you entertained while you're on the go.
partner: Made in cooperation with BlackMoon Design
